title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

reviews.text: A breathtaking journey in a richly imagined world.
A timeless epic of adventure and bravery.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

reviews.text: A revolutionary film that redefined the space opera genre.
An imaginative and exciting start to a legendary saga.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

reviews.text: A visually stunning and thought-provoking film.
A timeless classic of the science fiction genre.

title: The Matrix
description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

reviews.text: An innovative blend of philosophy and action.
A groundbreaking film that redefined reality.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

reviews.text: A triumphant conclusion to an epic trilogy.
A masterpiece of fantasy cinema.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

reviews.text: A thrilling middle chapter.
Visually stunning and emotionally powerful.

title: Spirited Away
description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

reviews.text: A magical and unforgettable journey.
A masterpiece of animation.

title: The Wizard of Oz
description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.

reviews.text: A timeless classic.
Still magical after all these years.

title: The Princess Bride
description: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

reviews.text: A witty and charming fairy tale.
Endlessly quotable and fun.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

reviews.text: Dark, beautiful, and moving.
A fantasy for adults.

title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
description: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

reviews.text: A magical adaptation of a classic.
Faithful and enchanting.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony.

reviews.text: A visually stunning epic.
A masterpiece of animation.

title: The NeverEnding Story
description: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

reviews.text: A childhood favorite for generations.
Imaginative and heartfelt.

title: Willow
description: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

reviews.text: A fun and adventurous fantasy.
Classic 80s fantasy.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

reviews.text: A mind-bending masterpiece.
Visually stunning with a complex narrative.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

reviews.text: A breathtaking exploration of time, space, and love.
Ambitious, visually stunning, and emotionally powerful.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

reviews.text: A masterclass in psychological horror.
A terrifying and visually striking classic.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

reviews.text: Epic fantasy with complex characters and political intrigue.
A groundbreaking series that redefined television.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

reviews.text: A captivating adaptation with excellent action sequences.
Rich world-building and strong performances.

title: Dark
description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

reviews.text: A mind-bending time travel narrative with impeccable execution.
Complex, atmospheric, and brilliantly structured.

title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

reviews.text: A perfect blend of 80s nostalgia and supernatural thrills.
Compelling characters and a strong sense of atmosphere.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

reviews.text: One of the greatest television series of all time.
A masterclass in character development and storytelling.

title: The Mandalorian
description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

reviews.text: A return to Star Wars' roots with a fresh perspective.
Visually stunning with a compelling narrative.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

reviews.text: A magical beginning to an extraordinary series.
Enchanting and full of wonder.
